Entries.6398443/f Juliet 3500/t 1800 2200/L: playful/12 17/Juliet -100 -100 0 farmer 12 18 0/addConversationTopic Juliet_TalentShow 7/skippable/pause 500/playSound doorOpen/warp Juliet 12 20/jump farmer 5/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2/speak Juliet "Oh good, you're home.$1#$b#Sooooo, I may have mentioned to the Mayor that things were pretty dull around here and... guess what?"/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak Juliet "I've got a promotion! I'm now the Official Events Co-ordinator for PT!"/emote farmer 16/speak Juliet "Yeh, I'm pretty sure he made it up, and he's just palming off responsibility again, but who cares?#$b#I'm officially organizing an event to 'invigorate the community.'#$b#His words, not mine. Pretentious BS. It's a party. Let's call it a party.$1"/quickQuestion #Sounds great, you'll do an awesome job!#That's a lot of responsibility, are you sure you're up for it?#He's just trying to get you off his back.(break)emote Juliet 20\speak Juliet "Yeah, I hope so! It's exciting, isn't it?"(break)emote Juliet 12\speak Juliet "Huh, I guess I married you to be my killjoy.$5#$b#Well, ye of little faith. I'll prove you wrong. You'll see!"(break)emote Juliet 40\speak Juliet "Oh yeh, totally. But that doesn't mean I can't rock his socks off.#$b#Not that I really want to... I bet he's got bunions or ingrown toenails. Eww.$5"/speak Juliet "You're gonna help me, right? You're like the true power behind this village. Everyone loves you.#$b#Me? Well, I'm just the loudmouth Joja chick. They'll just brush me off."/emote farmer 60/speak Juliet "Sweet. I knew I could count on you. It's a talent show. I'm seeking to expose everyone's hidden talents.#$b#Well, maybe not _expose_ cos, gross, but let's see what everyone's got. Right?"/emote farmer 56/pause 1500/end

Entries.6398444/A Juliet_TalentShow/e 6398443/t: playful/-100 -100/{{Juliet_SetUp}}/addConversationTopic Juliet_TalentShow2 7/skippable/changeToTemporaryMap CommunityCenterJuliet/viewport 32 17/faceDirection Juliet 2/textAboveHead Juliet "You're here!"/faceDirection Lewis 2/speed Juliet 5/move Juliet 0 5 2 true/speed farmer 5/move farmer 0 -5 0 true/speak Juliet "About time! Either way, it'll definitely be interesting!#$b#Come on, let's get this show on the road!"/fade/viewport -100 -100/message "Please Be patient while we set things up"/{{Juliet_MainEvent}}/viewport 32 13 true/pause 1000/speak Juliet "Hey everyone! Welcome to Pelican Town's first ever Talent Show. No judges, no prizes, just heaps of fun!"/textAboveHead Abigail "No prizes?"/pause 1000/textAboveHead Sebastian "Lame."/speak Juliet "Oh, and free food courtesy of Gus and Evelyn."/jump Gus 5/emote Evelyn 32/speak Juliet "But you guys didn't come to listen to me talk. So, let's begin!#$b#Clint, you're up first!"/jump Clint 5/move Juliet 0 2 0 true/stopMusic/move Clint 0 -1 0 true/playMusic WizardSong/fade/viewport -100 -100/warp Clint -50 -50/addTemporaryActor ClintMagician 16 32 32 11 2 true/addTemporaryActor ClintTophat 16 16 32 12 2 false/addTemporaryActor albinoRabbit 16 16 -50 -50 2 false/showFrame Haley 25/viewport 32 13 true/pause 500/emote ClintMagician 28/pause 500/textAboveHead Emily "Woooh! Clint!"/pause 3000/{{Clint_Heckle}}/shake ClintMagician 350/textAboveHead ClintMagician "Okay..."/pause 500/animate ClintMagician false false 240 0 1 2 3/pause 1000/playSound healSound/screenFlash 2/warp ClintTophat -50 -50/warp albinoRabbit 32 12/pause 500/textAboveHead Vincent "A bunny!"/emote Jas 20/jump albinoRabbit/emote albinoRabbit 16/faceDirection albinoRabbit 3/pause 500/faceDirection albinoRabbit 1/speed albinoRabbit 5/move albinoRabbit 5 0 3/warp albinoRabbit -50 -50/speak Jas "I'll keep you safe bunny!"/pause 500/{{Clint_Heckle2}}/pause 500/textAboveHead Wizard "Amateur..."/stopMusic/fade/viewport -100 -100/warp albinoRabbit 36 12/warp ClintMagician -50 -50/warp Clint 29 15/speak Juliet "Next up, a poem from Mr. Marvellous hair himself, Elliott!"/playMusic sadpiano/warp Elliott 32 11/faceDirection Elliott 2/viewport 32 13 true/faceDirection Clint 1/faceDirection Emily 3/{{Clint_Heckle3}}/faceDirection Clint 0/faceDirection Emily 0/pause 500/speak Elliott "Good afternoon, gentlemen and gentlewomen! And now that I have found her, I will remain with her, until the end of time. Forever.$1"/pause 2000/jump Juliet 5/move Juliet 0 -2 2/speak Juliet "Oh, you're done! That was... um... very poetic."/emote Elliott 40/pause 500/fade/stopMusic/viewport -100 -100/warp Elliott 36 15/faceDirection Elliott 0/fade/viewport -100 -100/warp Emily 32 11/animate Emily false true 250 16 17 16 17 20 21 20 21 18 19 18 19 22 23 22 23/warp Leah 33 11/animate Leah false true 250 30 31/warp Juliet 34 13/faceDirection Juliet 0/viewport 32 13 true/playMusic event2/pause 4000/emote Clint 20/emote Elliott 56/animate Vincent false true 250 20 8 21 8/pause 2000/fade/stopMusic/viewport -100 -100/stopAnimation Emily/stopAnimation Leah/stopAnimation Vincent/warp Emily 30 15/faceDirection Emily 0/warp Leah 37 15/faceDirection Leah 0/warp Vincent 32 11/faceDirection Vincent 2/viewport 32 13 true/pause 500/speak Vincent "What kind of tree fits in your hand?$3#$b#A palm tree!$1"/animate Marnie false true 200 33 34/emote Jodi 20/textAboveHead Kent "That's my boy."/pause 1000/fade/viewport -100 -100/stopAnimation Marnie/warp Vincent 26 11/faceDirection Vincent 1/warp Willy 32 11/playMusic desolate/faceDirection Willy 2/viewport 32 13 true/pause 500/speak Willy "...for although their love was true, it was not enough to keep her from the place she loved.#$b#The woman from the sea gave a sorrowful smile, turned, and walked into the waves.#$b#She never looked back. Yet still the fisherman, now with hair turned grey, waits for her on the wharf. Entries.Juliet_TalentShow: Hidden talents? Well, I could bring along my flute... Or maybe have a word with Sam and Seb.#$b#Yeah, I'm in! This sounds like fun.$1
Entries.Juliet_TalentShow2: Yeh, Juliet's pretty cool.

Entries.Juliet_TalentShow: Well, I don't know about 'hidden', but I suppose I could display my awesome ball handling skills.#$b#Why are you laughing?$2
$1 Pierre_Opera#Hmm... not sure what my hidden talent is, but you should ask Pierre about his opera singing.#$b#Oh, he thinks I don't know, but the walls have ears!$1
You want me to stand up in front of everyone? Oh... No, I couldn't.$4
Entries.Juliet_TalentShow2: Do you think Emily was impressed?

Entries.Juliet_TalentShow: The chance to demonstrate the importance of science? Oh yes, @, you can count me in.
My hidden talent?$4#$b#Oh, I don't think I'm ready for everyone to see that, not yet! But I'll come up with something, don't worry!$1
...as the last leaf withers on the bough, it breaks free to dance with the wind...#$b#Of course I shall attend your Talent Show. But piano or poetry? There-in lies the dilemma.
Oh, a talent show sounds like an excellent idea. Just what this town needs!#$b#I'll bake some of my chocolate chip cookies!
Entries.Juliet_TalentShow2: The talent show certainly was fun, my dear. We should do that again sometimes.#$b#Maybe I'll even dust of my dancing shoes!$1

Entries.Juliet_TalentShow: A talent show? Hah, well, could be worth a laugh or two, I suppose.#$b#You want to know my hidden talents? Nothing I'd care to demonstrate to an audience.
Entries.Juliet_TalentShow2: Hmph, bunch of nonsense. Hardly any talent to be seen. Mind you, the food was decent.

Entries.Juliet_TalentShow: Oh, no-one's likely to be interested in my hidden talents, I'm afraid.$4#$b#Unless someone hurts themselves, I suppose.$2
Entries.Juliet_TalentShow2: Seems like people had fun. Who knows, maybe next year I'll give it a go.

Entries.Juliet_TalentShow: A talent show? That sounds fun... well, more fun than hanging around the house, anyway.#$b#Hey, do you need a photographer?$1
Entries.Juliet_TalentShow2: I've got some pretty good shots, @. Pity we don't have some sort of local magazine.#$b#Hmm... now there's an idea!

Entries.Juliet_TalentShow: No hidden talents! But Ms. Juliet's asked me to cater.$1
Entries.Juliet_TalentShow2: Business has been a bit slow these last few days. Guess I over-catered again.#$b

Entries.Juliet_TalentShow: Wood carving's not really a spectator sport. Now, an exhibition - that might be more my thing.
Entries.Juliet_TalentShow2: Dancing was fun. Plus Robin seems impressed in my carving skills. She even said she might have some work for me!

Entries.Juliet_TalentShow: It shall be my pleasure to attend your Juliet's Talent Show, @.#$b#But to participate? Well, that may take more consideration.
Entries.Juliet_TalentShow2: It's so nice to see everyone coming together. Really makes me feel part of a community.

Entries.Juliet_TalentShow: Juliet's hosting a Talent Show? That sounds like fun.#$b#Oh, there's not time for hidden talents when you're raising two boys, I'm afraid.#$b#Unless you consider cleaning...$2
Entries.Juliet_TalentShow2: I'm so proud of Vincent, getting up there and telling jokes to everyone.

Entries.Juliet_TalentShow: A talent show? Sounds interesting. I'll be there.
Oooh, a Talent Show! I'll need to see what sort of gadget I can come up with!$1#$b#HIDDEN talents? Oh... but that's less fun!$3
Hey kid. Nope, no hidden talents here.#$b#Unless you consider truck driving, but that ain't gonna cut it, is it?
Entries.Juliet_TalentShow2: Not a bad afternoon's entertainment, right enough.

Entries.Juliet_TalentShow: You want me to demonstrate my hidden talents? Well, I was quite the boxer back in the day.#$b#Find me a worthy opponent and I'll put on a show!$1
I should what? Caroline told you that?$3#$b#Did she happen to mention if it impressed her?$2
It's good to see Juliet realizing her potential. For all her sharp tongue, she works hard.
Entries.Juliet_TalentShow2: i'll have to say, Juliet's impressed me. You've been a good influence on her, @.

Entries.Juliet_TalentShow: Oh, a talent show sounds like a wonderful idea!#$b#My hidden talents? Well, I suppose I could milk a cow!
Entries.Juliet_TalentShow2: A pleasant afternoon, spent in good company. I tried to persuade Shane to participate too, but he declined.#$b#Ah well, maybe next year.

Entries.Juliet_TalentShow: You need performers? Oh... no, I don't think I could. Kids are one thing, but to talk to all the town? Oh, I couldn't!$2
Entries.Juliet_TalentShow2: Vinny did very well. He trialed jokes on us all week.#$b#But I do wish he'd take his studies more seriously.$2

Entries.Juliet_TalentShow: Hmm, not sure how well my skills carry to the stage.#$b#Hidden talents, you say? Oh, well I'll try to think of something!
Entries.Juliet_TalentShow2: Leah does very nice work. Almost makes me wonder if it's worth taking on an apprentice.

Entries.Juliet_TalentShow: A chance for the band to perform together? That's epic! I'm in!
Entries.Juliet_TalentShow2: Your wife's pretty awesome. I tried to get her onto the drums, but Abigail wasn't budging.

Entries.Juliet_TalentShow: Yeh, of course we'll play at your talent show. I wasn't too keen, but Abby and Sam twisted my arm.$2
Entries.Juliet_TalentShow2: Okay, I admit it. It was quite fun playing for an audience again.

Entries.Juliet_TalentShow: Hidden talents? Hah. No. I don't think so.$2
Entries.Juliet_TalentShow2: Jas had fun. Me? Well, the food was good.

Entries.Juliet_TalentShow: Hidden talents? Well, maybe. But I don't think Charlie would like all the attention.$3
Entries.Juliet_TalentShow2: You know, I worked with Jules for ages, but never really got to know her.#$b#Kinda now feel like I missed out. She seems pretty alright.

Entries.Juliet_TalentShow: You need entertainers? Oh, I'm sure I've got just the story for you!#$b#Have I told you about my friend who fell in love with a mermaid?#$b#No? Well, I've got quite the treat for you!
Entries.Juliet_TalentShow2: What happened to the fisherman and his fish-wife? Oh... that's a tale for another day!

Entries.Juliet_TalentShow: I am not a wizard-for-hire you know....$1
Thanks for the invitation, @, but I'm going to have to decline.#$b#I don't think my skills would go down too well in the Community Center.
Thanks for the invitation, kid, but I'm going to have to decline.#$b#I don't think my skills would go down too well in the Community Center.
Entries.Juliet_TalentShow2: Can't fault the company. Performances were a little lacklustre though.

Entries.Juliet_TalentShow: I don't have any hidden talents, but I do have a nice standing geode. Juliet suggested I help with the decorations.
Okay... The Mayor's letting us use the community center... so... I've gotta get onto the decorations, talk to Gus about catering...#$b#Gah, this organizing lark is so complicated, isn't it!
Entries.Juliet_TalentShow2: The Mayor wants me to organize it again next year. I guess that means it was a success, right?$1

Entries.Juliet_TalentShow: Ms Juliet is seeking our secret talents? Oh, I am sure my skills are much too mundane.#$b#Well, I could tell a tale of the goblins, I guess... Or maybe hunt out that old bone flute...
Our Juliet is organizing a talent show? Oh, I always knew one day she'd shine.#$b#Oh, no, no-one wants to see my secret talent. But I'll support her from the side line!$1
Oh cool! I wonder if I can teach my snail a few tricks. Oooh, or I could tell jokes!$1#$b#What do you call a fake noodle?$3#$b#An im-pasta! Get it!$1
Entries.Juliet_TalentShow2: That was so much fun! But if we do it again, can we have prizes next time?$1

Entries.Juliet_TalentShow: Oh! Performing in front of everyone sounds a bit scary.
Entries.Juliet_TalentShow2: Mr Clint said Mr. Snuffles could come live with me!$1#$b#We made him a house in the barn!

Entries.Juliet_TalentShow: Oh yes, your talent show. How droll. I'd do anything for Jas, but tricks? Well... maybe if cheese were involved.$3
Entries.Juliet_TalentShow2: Great... so Jas has a rabbit now. It doesn't like me much. Keeps staring at me with those creepy pink eyes.#$b#Also, I think it could be a vampire.

Entries.Juliet_TalentShow: My hidden talents could flatten the town, and leave the villagers cowering like the frightened animals they once were.#$b#I believe you'd prefer I merely spectate.
Entries.Juliet_TalentShow2: They all believe the hat into rabbit was an illusion, clever trickery.#$b#How naive, how innocent, they are.
